name: Sentry Crash
hook: A weak emergency hail is being emitted from a crater on the surface, a look from orbit could determine if anyone survived.

textLogs.message: Telescopes activated… filtering atmospheric distortion now. How’s the image look?
I see movement! Looks like… two figures, can’t see too well though. Bring us down lower.
Okay, we’re through the fog, let’s see what we got… hm… damn. Nevermind mother, no one is here.

setStrings.value: Thermal cams failed to confirm any survivors of the crashed vessel. It looks like two sentry bots were dispatched after the crash, and have been slowly etching a ditch into the surface with their patrol. Given the depth of their tracks, we estimate they’ve been traveling in circles for several centuries… I’m sorry to say, any survivors must have died a long time ago.
